description.en: The virtual reality game “History of the Archana Continent” became part of reality, and “players” who were synchronized with humans appeared to protect the world. Lee Hoyeol, who was an ordinary salaryman, took over the body of the character he created in middle school, “Grandfell Claudi Arpeus Romeo.” Under normal circumstances, it would have been an absolute failure of a career, but Grandfell, whose occupation is a “demon hunter,” becomes extremely proud in front of demons! The only demon hunter in this world, Grandfell (= Lee Hoyeol) starts to make a move!

title.en: Your Scent is a Little Sweet

altTitles.en: Your Taste Is A Little Sweet

description.en: Because Tang Chao (α) had never mentally experienced the onset of secondary sexual characteristics, she had been working as a cover model as a beta. After unexpectedly having sex with an omega, she found out that she can only be close with this omega. The next day, she met her new colleague Li Zhixu, who seems to be that omega. But... isn't this Li Zhixu a beta?
description.zh: 唐朝因为心理阴影从未经历第二性征的发作，因此她一直以贝塔的身份在做平面模特。在意外与一个欧米伽经历了甜蜜后，她发现自己能够且只能够接近这位欧米伽。第二天她发现自己的新同事李之叙，似乎正是那个她？可是……这个李之叙明明是个贝塔？

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 月が綺麗ですね

description.en:
"This is a story of a country far, far away. What distinguished the citizens of this country apart from others was the animal ears on their heads and also, their acceptance of same-sex marriage."  
  
Kasuga Chiru is the only daughter of a powerful and wealthy family. At seven years old she was engaged to Shinonome Senri, a girl from a family of much lower status. But besides that day, the two never met again. Now sixteen, Chiru prepares to marry her betrothed, yet she wonders if the kind Senri has changed over the years they've been apart, and whether they can become a happy family even though their union is arranged. Upon visiting Senri's town, Chiru is overwhelmed by all the love and fondness the townspeople have for their apothecary, Senri. Chiru begins to feel a stirring in her heart, that same wonderful feeling the night Senri rescued her, the night they met. A tender love story of arranged marriages and fox girls begins!

altTitles.ja: かんたべりーでいず！

description.en: An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.

title.en: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity

altTitles.ja: 湿度高めのボーイッシュ彼女

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: 史上最高の領地設計士

description.en:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?

---
**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shishijilingdishejishi/list?title_no=1922)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001690)
description.ja:
大自然の中でのスローライフもよし、最高の教育機関で学ぶのもよし！交通の便はもちろんのこと、赤ちゃんからご老人までどの世代の方にもご満足いただけるワンストッププレミアムライフをフロンテラ男爵領がご提案いたします！現在、先着順にて分譲契約中！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shishijilingdishejishi/list?title_no=1922)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001690)
description.ko:
소설 속 귀족이 된 토목공학도 김수호. 
그런데 뭐? 내 영지가 곧 망할 거라고? 
그럼 살려야지. 설계하고, 건설하고, 분양해서. 

【전 대륙이 기다려온 특별한 기회! 퍼펙트한 교통, 최상의 학군, 쾌적한 숲세권, 원스톱 프리미엄 영지 라이프의 프론테라 남작령이 여러분을 기다립니다. 선착순 분양계약중!】

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shishijilingdishejishi/list?title_no=1922)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001690)
description.ru:
Инженер-строитель Ким Су Хо стал аристократом на страницах романа. Но вот незадача! Поместье на грани банкротства? Тогда нужно спасать землю. Проектировать, строить и продавать. [Уникальная возможность, которую так ждал весь континент! Вас ждут идеальная транспортная развязка, лучший школьный район, приятный лесной массив и барон Фронтера, владелец уникальной недвижимости премиум-класса. Договор купли-продажи заключается в порядке очереди!]

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shishijilingdishejishi/list?title_no=1922)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001690)
description.zh:
穿越到小说成了废物贵族！
逆天改命构建商业帝国！
土木设计工程学专业的金修豪意外穿越到小说里，还成为了一个在初期就会死掉的废物贵族。已经看到小说结局的修豪知道自家的领地快玩儿完了！那得赶紧救活它啊！设计，建设，出售啊！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/shishijilingdishejishi/list?title_no=1922)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001690)
description.es-la: Kim Suho, que es ingeniero civil, se convirtió en un noble dentro de una novela. ¿Y qué? ¿Mi patrimonio está a punto de fracasar? Entonces debe salvarse. Diseñar, construir y vender. [¡La esperada oportunidad especial en todo el continente! El transporte perfecto, el distrito educativo más alto, un área forestal agradable y una vida familiar de primera calidad en Baron Frontera que todos han estado esperando. ¡Un contrato por orden de llegada!

description.en:
For centuries, ‘Rustica Genesis,’ a brilliant knight of the Kaleta Empire, known for battling against the persistent ‘barrier’ and endless wars, found herself acclaimed. However, as if in a lie, all her strength vanished overnight.

Following this, a mysterious man named ‘Hayden,’ who appeared before her after four years of wandering like a beggar, shared a sweet night with her. Hayden seems to remember Rustica from the past.

Meanwhile, the Emperor of Kaletha summons her, who had been wandering like a beggar for four years, and dispatches her as a diplomat to the Perseta Empire, a longtime enemy beyond the crumbling barrier.

Will Rustica, the former knight who lost all her strength, be able to rediscover her past self?

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…
A cute rice ball team explains poetry in 4 panel comics.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

title.en: Who Saw the Peacock Dance in the Jungle?

altTitles.ja: クジャクのダンス、誰が見た？

altTitles.ja-ro: Kujaku no Dance, Dare ga Mita?

altTitles.en: Who saw the peacock dance in the jungle?

description.en:
A former cop was murdered on a snowy Christmas Eve night. The suspect was arrested & the case appeared to be closed.

However, a letter left by the murdered former cop to his daughter sets the case back on track. It said, "If any of the following persons are arrested or prosecuted...they are falsely accused." And on that list was the name of the suspect who was arrested for killing her father...

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

description.en:
Seolru, a novice hunter who lives alone in the deep mountains with her elderly father, because the weather around her changes constantly depending on her emotions. One day, she goes on a night hunt to catch a badger instead of her father and accidentally shoots a person...

«Father, what should I do now? I think I killed a man!»

Ryun, the crown prince of Cloud Dragon, went hunting with his servants, but was caught up in the empress' scheme and wandered the hunting grounds alone. To make matters worse, he collapses after being hit by an arrow shot by Seolru. Gathering all the remaining strength, he tried to kill the killer who approached him, but even that failed...

«Why did you keep me alive? Did they tell you to let me live, because they will come and cut my throat?»

But the killer who's the size of a rat in front of him is not a killer! Besides, he wasn't even a boy, he was a girl in disguise? Seolru, carrying her own sin of hurting the body of the national treasure by shooting an arrow and her father who thrust a dagger unaware of his identity, eventually becomes a trophy of war and follows Ryun into the imperial palace.. The land of dragons hidden by clouds. ‘Seolru’, a young dragon who knows how to command the sky, and ‘Ryun’, the Crown Prince of Unryong, who greedily keeps her by his side.

Can the love between the two, which has just blossomed from the wrong desires surrounding the legends and oracles that have been handed down since the beginning of time, be preserved until eternity?

altTitles.ja: 魔女の執行人

description.en: Witches who defy the law must face judgment. 150 years ago, witches descended from the moon, and ever since, this country has promoted and fostered a deep bond between them and its people. However, not all witches abide by the law. Chosen from their own ranks, an “Enforcer” brings them to justice. Among them is Witch Natalia, who one day encounters a boy afflicted by a curse...?!

Han Xiao, a veteran player of the game "Galaxy" died unexpectedly in the middle of doing a leveling request. He was transmitted to the game world ten years earlier and became an NPC with a player's panel and was reborn in the base of the game's villain. In order to survive, Han Xiao resolutely chose the "Mechanic" occupation and concentrated on cultivation. Familiar with the iterations and rules of multiple versions of the game, he vowed to lead the army of machines, overthrow the villains, and rise from scratch to become the strongest.

Alternative RAWs:
[IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1ttzvn5jsqd.html)
[BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30386)

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.ja: 星屑テレパス

altTitles.th: โทรจิตละอองดาว

description.en: Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends, until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.    From the up-and-coming author Okuma Rasuko, a dazzling story about yuri, space and youth.
description.pt-br: Umika é uma estudante muito gentil e tímida. Ela acha difícil falar com outras pessoas e sonha em um dia conhecer alguém de outro planeta. Mas sua solitária vida escolar toma um rumo cósmico quando ela conhece a nova aluna transferida chamada Yu, uma alienígena com poderes telepáticos! As duas se aproximam e prometem um dia irem ao espaço. É assim que elas decidem construir um foguete e disparar em direção às estrelas, fazendo novas amizades pelo caminho.

description.en:
a "heterogeneous" society where supernatural beings blend in. For these monsters, "cruel" is not enough to describe them. One such monster's unexpected appearance at funeral of Jeongyeon's mother forces her to enter their world. 

Don't you hate to see yourself being unfairly manipulated, don't you want revenge for all your suffering? 

Someone caught her just when she was about to collapse.

title.en: The Specific Heat Capacity Of Love

altTitles.es-la: La capacitat tèrmica específica de l'amor

description.ca: Una noia va d'excursió a la costa i es troba amb un noi misteriós que li explica una dramàtica història entre un ocell i un tauró. Finalment, la noia decideix ajudar-lo a complir el seu últim desig.
description.en: A girl goes to the seaside on her class field trip and accidentally meets a mysterious handsome boy, after talking, she hears a dramatic story about a bird and fish, finally the kind girl decides to help the bird fulfill its last wish.
description.pl: Podczas wycieczki nad morze introwertyczna dziewczyna spotyka tajemniczego mężczyznę, który opowiada jej swoją historię.

altTitles.ja: さんかくトワイライト

description.en:
Pure-hearted sentimental love depicting the complex love triangle of an emotionless handsome half-Japanese boy and a dedicated Kansai dialect-speaking delinquent high school boy. A new story is born.

Miki, a delinquent who enjoys fights and is feared by those around him, ends up becoming a library committee member with Ikkei, who is his complete opposite. While they clash due to their contrasting personalities, Ikkei learns one day that Miki has a crush on his childhood friend and senior, "Watarun". Despite the surprise, Ikkei supports Miki without prejudice and somehow becomes cherished.

Initially, Ikkei couldn't stand Miki, but as time goes on, he starts to find him adorable...?

altTitles.ja: 私を食べないで

altTitles.th: ได้โปรดอย่ากินข้าเลยท่านดยุก

description.en:
"A bargain for 5 billion marukas."

"Sure enough, it's a bargain."

'Ertha', who is destined to be eaten alive by the male protagonist bargained marriage with him to change fate! I was reincarnated into a rated 19+ male-oriented fantasy novel. As the original story goes, Ertha was eaten alive by the protagonist Zahid, but I can't die like that because I have my little siblings. I offered a deal to the main character who'd eat me up. I'm the target of the proposal, 5 billion Marukas! All I have to do now is run away before the main character gets a chance to eat me. Can I, Ertha, escape from the hands of Zahid, the greatest wizard in the kingdom?

---
Ertha Arlez is an impoverished purifier looking to provide for her family. Duke Zahid El Callenor is a wealthy and powerful magician looking to cleanse his evil energy. The two seem like a perfect match… except that Zahid is fated to eat Ertha alive! Ertha must keep the duke at arm’s length for her own protection, but the intimate purification process combined with Zahid’s nonstop flirting make that nearly impossible. Can she stave him off and stay alive, or will she be consumed by passion?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56403295)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/please-dont-eat-me-comic/info)

* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/devorante_obsession)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/68673)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/2556)
description.fr:
Elle s’est réincarnée dans un roman fantastique pour public averti! Une histoire si sombre qu’elle n’a jamais réussi à en lire la fin… Tout ce qu’elle sait c’est que son mari, un mage surpuissant, va finir par la dévorer vivante! Heureusement, elle a un atout de taille: elle est l’unique purificatrice de ce monde, la seule à pouvoir sauver les mages de la folie qui les guette, grâce à son toucher. Sauf qu’il se trouve que son frère et sa sœur sont aussi appelés à devenir des mages, et que son époux n’est vraiment pas partageur…

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56403295)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/please-dont-eat-me-comic/info)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%8B%9C%E8%A8%97%E5%88%A5%E5%90%83%E6%88%91/237)

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Tolong-Jangan-Makan-Aku/3460)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/68673)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/2556)
description.ru:
"Я переродилась в фэнтези-романе для мужчин в стиле 19 века. Согласно оригинальной истории, мне суждено быть съеденной главным героем Захидом. Однако я не могу просто так умереть, оставив своих маленьких брата и сестру. Поэтому я решила предложить сделку этому главному герою на сумму 5 миллиардов марок! Все, что мне осталось сделать, - это убежать от него через несколько лет, пока главный герой меня не съел.   
Сможет ли Эрта ускользнуть из рук Захида, величайшего волшебника Империи?"

---

description.th:
เออร์ตากลับมาเกิดในนิยาย เป็นตัวประกอบที่ต้องถูกพระเอกจับกิน แผนการเปลี่ยนชะตากรรมของตัวเองจึงเริ่มขึ้น?!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56403295)

* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%8B%9C%E8%A8%97%E5%88%A5%E5%90%83%E6%88%91/237)

description.tr: "Teklifim 5 milyar maruka." " Bu teklif uygundur." Erkek kahraman tarafından diri diri yenilecek olan 'Ertha', kaderi değiştirmek için onunla evlilik pazarlığı yaptı! Ertha, +18 bir fantezi romanına reenkarne oldum Orijinal hikaye devam ederken, Ertha kahramanı Jahid tarafından diri diri yenildi, ama ben böyle ölemem çünkü küçük kardeşlerim var. Beni yiyen ana karaktere bir anlaşma teklif ettim. Teklifin hedefinde ben varım ve 5 milyar Maruka karşılığında! Şimdi tek yapmam gereken, ana karakter beni yeme şansı olmadan kaçmak. Ertha, krallığın en büyük büyücüsü Zahid'in elinden kaçabilecek miyim?
description.pt-br: Ertha reencarnou em um romance de fantasia +18. De acordo com o plot original, ela será comida viva pelo protagonista, Zahid, e para mudar seu destino ela negociou um casamento com ele! Agora, tudo o que ela tem a fazer é fugir antes que ele tenha a chance de devorá-la. Poderá Ertha escapar das mãos de seu marido, o maior mago do reino?

altTitles.ja: 機動戦史ガンダム 武頼

description.en:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!
description.ja:
巨大な“鉄機”達が火華を散らす、新たなガンダム戦絵巻、爆誕!!

参勤鋼對――それは、全国各地から選ばれた猛者が、巨大な鎧武者・鉄機に乗り込み、最強を決める一大バトルトーナメント。『頑駄無』武頼を駆る如月虎鉄は、己が望みを果たすため過酷な戦へと身を投じるが…！？
description.pt-br: Uma nova história de guerra Gundam  nasce, onde os gigantescos 'Tetsuki' espalham as chamas do conflito. O 'Sankin Koutai', um grande torneio de batalha em que lutadores selecionados em todo o país, embarcam em guerreiros blindados gigantes conhecidos como Tetsuki, para determinar o mais forte. Kotetsu Kisaragi, com seu 'Gundam' Burai, se joga nesta batalha dura para cumprir seu desejo.

title.en: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree

altTitles.zh: 成为团宠后，我大杀四方

description.en: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.

title.en: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much

altTitles.zh: Jiù Mìng! Chuān Yuè Shòu Shì Shé Fū Chāo Chǒng Wǒ!
救命！穿越兽世蛇夫超宠我！

altTitles.zh-ro: Jiu Ming! Chuan Yue Shou Shi She Fu Chao Chong Wo!

description.en:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?
description.fr:
Lu Ling s'est fait transmigré dans le monde d'un livre alors qu'elle était en train de le lire avant d'aller se coucher et après cela elle devenu une biche !

Elle est arrivé au moment de l'histoire où Lu Ling a accepté de devenir la partenaire de She Ying pour récupéré ses ressources pour l'hiver.

Après avoir transmigré Lu Ling n'a pas supporté de faire subir ça a She Ying et donc elle assez de s'éloigner de lui.
Meme si le fait de quitter She Ying, pourrait mener à sa fin, Lu Ling a quand même décidé de se séparer de lui...

Que va t-il se passé et arrivé a Lu Ling dans ce nouveau monde ? Va t-elle rester avec She Ying ? Comment va t-elle vivre dans ce nouveau monde ?
description.zh: 鹿灵穿越到自己睡前刚看了一半的兽世小说中，成了一只炮灰鹿兽女配。目前的剧情正是鹿灵刚答应蛇影的“求偶”请求后，马上要利用未婚夫蛇影过冬的剧情。鹿灵穿越后，不忍蛇影再次经历被“自己背叛”和“无情抛弃”的剧情，虽然蛇影的离开可能会导致自己过冬失败，但鹿灵还是决定要“退婚”，无奈每次都被打断。

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

title.en: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore

altTitles.ja: 悪役貴族として必要なそれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore

altTitles.en: That Is Needed for a Villainous Aristocrat

description.en: A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel, *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasn’t reborn as the protagonist, but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him, he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil".
description.pt-br: Uma história de um homem com carisma maligno: Um jovem que viveu no Japão moderno de repente percebeu que renasceu em seu romance de fantasia favorito, "O Conto do Reino de Rhinana". No entanto, ele não renasceu como o protagonista, mas como o famoso vilão Marquês na história. Com o destino de ser derrubado pairando sobre ele, ele toma todas as medidas para se libertar de seu destino determinado usando seu conhecimento futuro junto com a habilidade mais forte "Mal Absoluto".

title.en: A Princess's Guide to Saving Dragons

description.en:
At dawn, the female lead suddenly died at the subway station due to overwork.

“If there is such a thing as reincarnation, please let me be born with a gold spoon. I want to have supreme authority, and also immeasurable wealth that can’t be squandered off~"

These final words which were meant as a half-hearted joke somehow came true?! The female lead’s soul entered into a game and became a true princess, is this the legendary "blessing from good karma"???

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: オメガトライブ

description.en: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――

altTitles.es-la: El mago prodigio devorador de medicina

description.en:
Renoc was supposed to be a video game character, so giving him a dying body in exchange for extreme magical prowess felt reasonable. However, when his creator wakes up inside Renoc's body, it doesn't feel like a game anymore!

His life in the game is unbearable until he discovers the mysterious drug Vyper, which gives him the strength to wield his magic to its full potential.

As Renoc walks a fine line with the drug that could save or destroy him, can he find a way to survive in this new world?
description.pt-br:
"World", um jogo que esbanja extrema liberdade.

Na "versão 3.0", eu decidi colocar tudo o que tinha para aumentar o talento de magia!

Todos os atributos que possuo são sobre magia!

Aumentar o talento de magia do personagem fez com que ele tivesse diversas características negativas. Mas isso não importa. Vou criar o mago mais poderoso, mesmo que o personagem pareça um cadáver.

Mas... o que é isso? Eu me tornei o personagem -

 um personagem com talento incrível, mas que não pode passar um dia sem seus remédios.

title.en: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi

altTitles.en: The Death Mage Who Doesn't Want a Fourth Time

altTitles.ja-ro: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi
Yondome wa Iyana Shi Zokusei Majutsushi

altTitles.ru: Маг смерти, не желающий четвёртой реинкарнации

altTitles.ja: 四度目は嫌な死属性魔術師

altTitles.zh: 讨厌第四次的死属性魔术师

altTitles.fa: جادوگر مرگی که نمیخواد واسه بار چهارم تناسخ پیدا کنه

altTitles.ko-ro: Shi-dome wa Iyana Shi Zokusei Majutsu-shi

altTitles.zh-hk: 討厭第四次的死屬性魔術師

altTitles.es-la: El Nigromante que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez
El Mago del Atributo de Muerte que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez

description.en: Amamiya Hiroto is unlucky. His life consisted of misfortune after misfortune, culminating in an unlucky death during an incident on a school boat trip, trying to save a girl he barely knew. After death, he met a god of reincarnation who requested that the hundred or so dead passengers - one of them being the girl he tried in vain to save - be reincarnated into another world. Yet a series of unfortunate events forced Hiroto to reincarnate with even less luck than before, starting with nothing but a tremendous amount of Mana. His second life, far worse than his first, came to a cruel end. However, upon meeting the god a second time, he was informed that there would be yet another reincarnation, one that had already been set in motion and could not be stopped. Not wanting Hiroto to endure a third life filled with suffering, the god cursed him before he was reborn in the hopes that he would either die quickly or commit suicide. Hiroto was reborn once more as a half-vampire, half-dark elf. A dhampir. Not wanting a fourth life, he is determined to live this third life with the only things remaining from his previous lives - Death Magic and his enormous Mana pool.
description.fa:
امامیا هیروتو یه بدبخته بدشانسه که تو اردو مدرسش به کشتیشون حمله میشه و در راه نجات دختری که حتی نمیشناسش میمیره، بعد مرگش خدا رو میبینه که میخواد تمام کسایی که داخل حادثه ی کشتی مردن رو به یه دنیای دیگه تناسخ کنه
به هرحال بعد کلی بدبختی و بدشانسی اون زندگی دومش رو با مقدار زیادی مانا شروع کرد ولی زندگی دومش حتی بدتر از زندگیه اولش به پایان رسید
به هرحال بعد مرگ دومش دوباره خدارو دید و خدا بهش گفت که زندگیه سومی هم درکاره ولی خدا نمیخواست تو زندگی سومش دوباره بدبختی و زجر رو تحمل کنه برای همین اونو نفرین کرد که یا سریع بمیره یا خودکشی کنه
این دفه هیروتو به عنوان یه دامپیر تناسخ کرد و قصد نداره یه زندگیه چهارم رو تجربه کنه برای همین با چیزایی که از زندگی های قبلیش داره یعنی مانای خیلی زیاد و جادوی مرگ میخواد کارای ناتمومش رو تموم کنه
description.ru:
Главному герою Амамия Хирото не везёт. Его жизнь состоит из цепочки неудач и в конце концов он умирает вследствие несчастного случая на корабле во время школьной экскурсии, погибнув при попытке спасти девушку, которую он едва знал. После смерти он встречает Бога Реинкарнации, которому требуются около ста мертвых пассажиров — среди которых девушка, которую он безуспешно пытался спасти — для перерождения в другом мире. Однако череда несчастливых событий вынуждает Хирото переродиться с ещё меньшей удачей, чем раньше, не имея в начале пути ничего, кроме огромного количества маны. Его вторая жизнь, что была гораздо хуже первой, приводит его к жестокому концу. Несмотря на это, встретившись с Богом в третий раз, он узнает, что будет и третья реинкарнация – она уже запущена и не может быть отменена. Не желая, чтобы Хирото вновь претерпевал жизнь, полную страданий, перед его перерождением Бог проклинает его, в надежде, что Хирото либо умрет быстро, либо совершит самоубийство. На сей раз Хирото переродился как наполовину вампир, наполовину тёмный эльф – дампир. Желая избежать четвёртой реинкарнации, он настроен прожить третью жизнь со способностями, что достались ему от предыдущих – Магией Смерти и Бассейном Маны.  
  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/bravekid0218)
description.es-la:
Amamiya Hiroto tuvo una vida desafortunada. Su vida consistió en desgracia tras desgracia, culminando en una desafortunada muerte durante un incidente en su viaje escolar en barco, al intentar salvar a una chica que apenas conocía. Después de morir, a Hiroto y al centenar de pasajeros muertos se les brindó una propuesta proveniente de un dios de la reencarnación. Así fue como ellos reencarnaron en otro mundo.

Sin embargo, por una serie de desafortunados y extraños acontecimientos, Hiroto fue forzado a reencarnar con muchísima menos suerte de la poca que ya tenía antes, comenzando así su segunda y desafortunada vida, únicamente con una tremenda cantidad de maná, por lo que su segunda vida fue mucho peor que la primera, concluyendo con un cruel final.

A pesar de ello, al encontrarse con ese estúpido dios por segunda vez, se le informó que tendría una tercera vida, que ya había sido puesta en marcha y no era posible evitarla. El dios, al no querer que Hiroto sufriera una tercera vida igual de cruel y llena de sufrimientos que la anterior, lo maldijo antes de que renaciera con la esperanza de que muriera rápidamente o se suicidara.

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラ CCC FoxTail
フェイト/エクストラ CCC フォックステイル

description.en:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
description.pt-br: Sendo expulso do mundo de Fate/Extra Kshinami Hakuno se encontra em uma situação muito estranha. Rota Caster.

altTitles.ja: アウターハロー

description.en:
When his band breaks up and Sora is feeling lost, he happens to attend a concert where he reunites with Tamaki Naoharu, an upperclassman from his middle school.

“I know that voice” -- a vivid memory from 10 years ago comes back to him.

But there's a huge distance between Naoharu, shining in the light of the stage, and Sora, standing in the audience...

The faint memory of his first love is reflected in these glittering lights. Sora and Nao's love story begins with a fated reunion.
description.ja:
組んでいたバンドが解散し、居場所を失ったような気持ちの宙（そら）は、たまたま足を運んだライブで、一時期同じ中学にいた先輩の環（たまき）と再会する。
この声、知ってる――よみがえる10年前の鮮烈な記憶。
しかしステージ上で光の中に立つ環と、観客席の自分にはあまりにも距離があって――。
ライブハウスのきらめく照明に、淡い初恋が反射する。再会から始まるバンドマンの恋！

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

description.en: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

altTitles.en: Heir to the Dragon Slayer Sword

description.en:
“Find Eraph’s hidden son. Then you’re free.”

Jericho, a normal young woman who grew up in a village in the countryside, sets out one day to find her biological father, who turned out to be the hero, Eraph. The heirloom which was given to her was the ‘Dragon Slayer Sword,’ and her life completely changed after becoming the new owner of the sword… But Jericho only wanted to give up her inheritance and live a normal life with her sick mother!

The ‘Dragon Slayer Sword’ she had obtained told her that Eraph had another child, a son. Apparently, he could be: The master of the wizard tower’s son, Cency Daisy. The richest man in the continent, the eldest son of the Stars family, Rozen Stars. The son of Princess Lillier, Magnor Newpay. Out of these three candidates, she needs to find her real brother!
description.ko:
"에라프의 숨겨진 아들을 찾아. 그럼 넌 자유야."

시골 마을에서 평범하게 자란 소녀 제리코.
어느 날, 친부가 영웅 에라프라는 사실을 알게 된다.

유품 '드래곤 슬레이어 소드'까지 얻고,
검의 새 주인으로서 삶은 완전히 바뀌는데... 
제리코는 자리를 넘기고 평범하게 살고 싶다.

자아를 가진 검, 드래곤 슬레이어 소드는
에라프에게 아들이 한 명 더 있다고 말해준다.

마탑주의 아들 샌시 데이지
대륙 최고의 부자 스타즈 상회의 장남 로젠 스타즈
릴리에 공주의 아들인 마그노 누페이

세 후보 중 진짜 오빠를 찾아야 한다!
description.zh-hk:
“找到埃拉夫藏起來的兒子，你就自由了。”傑瑞科，一個平凡的在鄉村長大的女孩。

有一天，她知道了自己的親生父親是英雄埃拉夫。得到遺物' 滅龍之劍’，作為劍的新主人的生活完全改變了…

傑瑞科希望放棄自己的位置，過平凡的生活。擁有自我的劍，滅龍之劍告訴她埃拉夫還有一個兒子。

馬塔主的兒子圣西·黛西是大陸最富有的斯塔集團公司的長子羅森·斯塔斯·禮來耶公主的兒子瑪格諾·努佩塞。

得在候選人中要找到真正的哥哥!

altTitles.ja: ぎゅぎゅっと高橋

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギスEVE

altTitles.ja-ro: kidō senshi gan damu varupurugisu EVE

description.en:
Haman Khan's sister stands up for her country!
In January 0089 of the Universal Century, Neo Zeon is defeated by AEUG in the final battle. Defeated by the ZZ Gundam, Haman Karn is killed in battle, and the remaining Neo Zeon warriors decide to fight in mourning. In order to counter the one-sided attack, Serana Khan, Haman Khan's sister, makes a sortie with the NT exclusive MS prototype Demartell. The secret story of the birth of the fake Haman Karn from "Mobile Suit Gundam Valpurgis" and the story of the birth of Over.On, which has never been told before, will be depicted!
description.ja:
ハマーン・カーンの妹、祖国のために立ち上がる――！

宇宙世紀００８９年１月、ネオ・ジオンはエゥーゴに最終決戦で敗北する。ZZガンダムに敗北したハマーン・カーンは戦死し、残されたネオ・ジオンの戦士たちは弔い合戦の決意をする。一方的な攻撃に対抗するためハマーン・カーンの妹、セラーナ・カーンはNT専用MSプロトタイプ・ディマーテルで出撃するのであった。今まで語られることのなかった「機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギス」の偽ハマーン・カーン誕生秘話とオーヴェロン誕生の物語が描かれる――！

title.en: Iki Dekinai no wa Kimi no Sei

altTitles.ja: 息できないのは君のせい

description.en:
"Shizuki-kun, you're not good at breathing."   
  
Jun Shizuki, a hedonistic womanizing saxophonist, has a clear weakness for the popular flute player Yukiji Yano. Their interactions start with simple brass band practice, and somehow build to repeated secret meetings at the hotel - !?

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.
